revised_title: Isolation and Study of Organo-Metallic Radicals: Mercuric, Plumbic, and Stannic Ethyl
tldr: The author, George Bowdler Buckton, discusses the isolation and study of organo-metallic radicals, specifically focusing on mercuric, plumbic, and stannic ethyl compounds. He describes various chemical reactions and syntheses to isolate these compounds and explores their properties and behavior. This research contributes to the understanding of organometallic chemistry and the development of new materials and compounds.
